participant_1.background:
A blue whale once swam past my boat.
I love romantic comedies, and they help me forget about my bad luck in relationships.
i enjoy jazz music.
I'm heading home after a long run to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
I love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin when I'm snorkeling.

participant_2.background:
I do not have a car, but I love collecting toys wearing little rain coats with my family.
I bought my first journal when I was 12 years old to help me cope with the bullying I was experiencing at school.
I exercise daily to keep my health in check and to have enough energy to keep up with my pets.
i enjoy going to festivals.
i am nurse.

content.text: Hey! What a beautiful day!
It is! I'm off to the festival, then I have to go to the grocery store. Are you up to anything exciting?
Heading home to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos!
Sounds great! I love tacos! What are your favorite toppings?
I like all the usual stuff: lettuce, tomatoes, guacamole, sour cream, etc. But I also love adding pineapple and shrimp!
Pineapple is a great idea! I've never tried shrimp on a taco, but I'm sure it would be delicious.
Oh my gosh, it's so good! You have to try it!
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I love going to festivals, concerts, and sporting events. I also love spending time with my family and friends.
Those all sound like great things to do!
They are! What about you? What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go snorkeling, scuba diving, and kayaking. I also love to watch romantic comedies and listen to jazz music.
Snorkeling and scuba diving sound amazing! I've never been, but I've always wanted to try.
They're so much fun! You should definitely try them sometime.
I will! I'm sure I'd love them.
I hope so!
Thanks for the chat! I have to go now, but I'll see you around!
Bye! Have fun at the festival!
Thanks! I will!
